input.sentences: it appears to me that jewish girls are hot
the whole family got together to observe
someone had too much kosher wine
output.sentences: Our jewish gathering was lacking hot girls.
Though there wern't any hot girls there was one my friend thought was kind of pretty.
I had to remind him we were there to observe the jewish holiday and spend time with our family; not to pick up chicks.
He decided it didn't matter because he could do both and it would be kosher.
I told him that was the incorrect use of the term kosher and to shut up and drink his wine.
